text:
Off on the yearly 4 week summer vacation! Just want to thank you all for making this community so darn great. I tend to hang around here more than our internal Slack workspace – and I'm not even really a developer :grimacing:

Looking forward to meeting some of you in September! :beers:

okay re-igniting name conversation. Going to get a poll started if you have a late entry and 5 or more people :thumbsup::skin-tone-2:  the idea, we will do a revote with that item.

We need to move quickly on this
